channel.title: Cookie Engineer's Web Log
channel.description: Web Log about Software Architecture and Automation

image.title: Cookie Engineer's Web Log
image.description: Web Log about Software Architecture and Automation

item.title: Implementer's Guide to SOCKS
item.description: A How-To Guide on building a SOCKS version 4/5 client and server from scratch, explaining related RFCs and potential quirks and problems with other implementations.

item.title: i3 Migration Guide
item.description: How to migrate from GNOME to i3, step by step with explanations for typical keybindings, configuration problems and status bar integrations.

item.title: Synaptics Touchpad on Linux
item.description: A How-To Configuration Guide for the legacy xf86-input-synaptics drivers on GNU/Linux systems.

item.title: Maintenance of Clearnets
item.description: A crash course in OSI layer theory, related bugs and exploits and what it means for the requirements of an Operating System and its software stack in order to improve anonymity in the face of god's eye like ISP overwatch scenarios.

item.title: Your Definition of Privacy is wrong
item.description: A reflection about Identity, Privacy and common misconceptions about fingerprinting and what it means to be undetected inside a swarm of watched and infiltrated devices.

item.title: Implementer's Guide to WebSockets
item.description: A How-To Guide on building a WebSocket version 13 client and server from scratch, explaining related RFCs and potential quirks and problems with other implementations.

item.title: Problems with Web Browsers
item.description: The evolution of the Web, its problems and a masterplan on how to improve it by building my own Web Browser.
